Posts.Content: Mdterp wrote: Hi all, I am really new to all this. I am 51 years old, and today I found a lump in my right breast. I went to the doctor, who confirmed my suspicions. I am really, really, worried. He said "I would bet the farm that it is not cancer". However, we thought it might be over an existing scar? I think that is not the case. I go for a mammogram and ultrasound on Friday, and I am really freaking out. I am really scared it is breast cancer and already thinking the worst. HELP!!!!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lump in right breast Mdterp FitChik
